eventScripts.script:
'''
	Get data from Kidde api. Refer to the global script
	When response ok, turn on connected bit.
	'''
	rootPath = '[default]sensors/kidde/'
	bufferTagPath = '[default]sensors/kidde/api/buffer'
	try:
		response = sensors.kiddeSmoke.getData()
		if response:
			system.tag.writeBlocking([bufferTagPath], [response])
			readBack = system.tag.readBlocking(bufferTagPath)[0].value
			for idx in range(len(readBack)):
				tagPath = rootPath + 'sensor_%d'%idx
				returnPath = g_script.tags.browseTag(tagPath)
				content = readBack[idx]
				returnData = g_script.tags.formatTags(content)
				writePathList,writeValueList=g_script.tags.formatToWritableList(tagPath, returnData, returnPath)
				system.tag.writeBlocking(writePathList, writeValueList)
			
			# set connected to true to indicated that API successfully called and wrote the tags.
			system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]sensors/kidde/connected'], [1])
		
		else:
			system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]sensors/kidde/connected'], [0])
	except:
		# when failed, turn off connected bit.
		system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]sensors/kidde/connected'], [0])

lamin = 35.0000
	lomin = -79.0000
	lamax = 36.0000
	lomax = -78.0000
	
	try:
		area_data = opensky.functions.query_area(lamin, lomin, lamax, lomax)
		system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]opensky/LastQueryDateTime'], system.date.now())
		data = []
		for state in area_data['states']:
		    data.append({'CallSign': state[1], "latitude": state[6], "longitude":state[5], 'true_track': state[10]})
		 
		if area_data:
			system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]opensky/flightData'], [system.util.jsonEncode(data)])
			system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]opensky/Connected'], [1])
		else:
			system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]opensky/Connected'], [0])
	except:
		system.tag.writeBlocking(['[default]opensky/Connected'], [0])

qsize = system.tag.readBlocking('[default]opensky/flightQueue/size')[0].value
	
	if qsize > 0:
		flightDataQueue = system.util.getGlobals()['flightDataQueue']
		data = flightDataQueue.get_nowait()
		system.tag.writeBlocking(["[.]singleFlightData"], [data])

if currentValue.value == True:
		flightDataQueue = system.util.getGlobals()['flightDataQueue']
		
		# Clear the queue by dequeuing all items
		while not flightDataQueue.empty():
		    flightDataQueue.get_nowait()
		    flightDataQueue.task_done()
		   
		# reset itself as acknowledgement
		system.tag.writeBlocking([tagPath], [0])
